title: Riot games Merch store
body:
i am unable to log in to the riot merch store. click sign in, enter details to log in. then directed back to login page. with this message

    Error
        Looks like this email address is already registered for another account. Please try again with a different email.

http://s31.postimg.org/49376du7v/Untitled.png

am i doing somthing wrong ( using the same login as i do for lol / boards)

replies.body: [Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for the merch store, they should be able to help you. (May take a day~ for someone to get back to you)
cheers, hopefully i don't miss out on Urf. would be mighty sad :(
He was sold out near instantly on most regions, OCE included :( dunno if they have plans to restock or not.

Hey SirArcticWarfare, 

You should be able to use your League of Legends credentials to login to the Merch store. Please confirm that you're trying to login under the Oceania server (as opposed to the North America server). If that still doesn't work, please [**submit a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Riot Games Player Support and they can look into any issues that may be occurring. 

Let me know if you need anything!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=aNEyGdip,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-23T00:18:43.116+0000)
>
> Hey SirArcticWarfare, 
> 
> You should be able to use your League of Legends credentials to login to the Merch store. Please confirm that you're trying to login under the Oceania server (as opposed to the North America server). If that still doesn't work, please [**submit a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Riot Games Player Support and they can look into any issues that may be occurring. 
> 
> Let me know if you need anything!

hi. im using the exact same log in details for OCE login on the oce version of the store, also checking to make sure im not using my summoners name but instead using the login details .  ( even tried on my mobile so its not the browser) to the ticket i go
